content.text:
HON. SEAN P. DUFFY

                              of wisconsin

                    in the house of representatives

                       Thursday, November 2, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. DUFFY. Mr. Speaker, I am not recorded because I was absent. Had I 
been present, I would have voted YEA on Roll Call No. 591.
content.speaker: Mr. DUFFY
